name: c19th sofa upholstered in grainsack
description: Delightful c19th sofa upholstered in a textured Hungarian grainsack,on turned feet and original sturdy brass castors.

name: Arnold Circus Stool
description:
Rotation moulded plastic
430 x 350 x 440mm (L/W/H)

Arnold Circus is situated in the heart of Shoreditch, E2, London, Uk. Built on the rubble of the old slums it is part of the Boundary Estate, London’s first council housing project. The Arnold Circus Stool designed by Martino Gamper, is part of the regeneration project.

Martino is an important European designer with an abiding interest in the social aspects of furniture design. 

Ideal for use as a stool, toy tidy, table support etc etc!

name: Antique French serviettes
description: Monogrammed set of five linen serviettes with a wonderful history of use. Large dinner size, these can be used for home, or craft purposes.

name: St Jude's fabric
description:
Proud to supply St Jude's fabrics, available by the metre.

St Jude’s makes unique fabrics and wallpapers, working with an eclectic range of artists to produce printed designs. 

 Provenance is a matter close to their hearts, prefering to make fabrics and wallpapers entirely in Britain in short runs. This enables them to develop ongoing relationships with great printers – people who really care about every inch of the material they produce.

Founded by Simon & Angie Lewin, the company works from two studios – one in Norfolk, England; the other in Morayshire, Scotland.

name: The British Isles
description:
Lithographic print, limited to an edition of 98. By Rachel Eardley
59x36

Silversmith and artist Rachel Eardley works in Somerset, she is influenced by quotidien domestic objects and is rooted in the craft traditions of the British Isles.

This print is unframed.

name: Treacle glaze mini mug
description:
These cute mugs are perfect for your children's babychinos, or your own espresso!
Made by Lucy Gamblin

name: Slate strung tags
description: Three slate marker tags strung with baker's twine, for use in the home or garden.

name: Porcelain Wing
description: Beautiful porcelain hanging wing token, pretty decorative delicate wingmade by Bridget Lennon.

name: Parker Knoll Armchair
description:
Granny chic Parker Knoll armchair, famed for their comfort and traditional style, upholstered in attractive foliate printed linen.

Please contact for shipping details.

name: Galvanised zinc pot
description:
Cool pots, perfect for herbs, in a galvanised zinc. 
Two sizes.

name: Silvered glass votive candle holder
description:
Pretty antiqued silver votive with fluted edge.
10cms high
10cms diameter at top

name: Wire basket
description: Wire basket with neat turned wooden handle. Perfect for use in the kitchen, bathroom or utility.

name: Silvered glass candlestick
description: A beautiful single silvered candlestick, romantic French vintage style for your wedding, dinner party or everyday use. Made using recycled glass.

name: Porcelain hanging 'Love' token
description: Handmade by Bridget Lennon. Beautiful, crisp, unglazed delicate porcelain love token. Strung with linen string.

name: Large flat mop plate seashell
description: A decorative large mop plate seashell, beautiful decorative accessory. Soap not included.

name: Antique French cotton box
description: Antique sewing cotton display box made of papier mache, with faded gold lettering.

name: Nat Thakur leather Anchor purse
description:
Designed and made by Nat Thakur. These soft leather purses are jauntily striped with embossed golden anchor on.
Zip top.

name: Nat Thakur Leather Sweet bag purse
description: Designed and made by Nat Thakur. Buttersoft leather purse in the form of a traditional sweet bag. Zip top.

name: Child's apron smock, berry trim
description:
Handmade in Somerset by Lucy Litchfield, this beautiful apron smock is made out of vintage mangle cloth, 100% cotton thread, 100% cotton biasbinding, and vintage buttons.
Sized to fit children from baby to about 3yrs. This can be bespoke made for older children. 
A practical and traditional garment this is a true heirloom piece.

name: Metal string dispenser
description: Hanging metal string dispenser with a roll of rustic twine. A must for any gardener, or keen utility organiser!

name: Vintage dowry linen sold by the metre
description:
Beautiful Eastern European vintage dowry linen sold by the metre.
A strong tactile, rustic fabric, stored in large chests as a dowry. Available at Life, suitable for upholstery, curtains, cushions, bedspreads, craft projects, clothing etc.
Width of roll 61cms
Simply add each metre length to your cart, or contact us for a larger order.

name: Ceramic Espresso Beakers - Pair
description:
Beautiful ceramic espresso beakers by Bridget Lennon with a stunning semi-matt black glaze glaze.

(Spoon is not included)

name: Dowry linen stripe textile
description:
A 2.5m length of beautiful striped dowry linen from Hungary. Amazing rustic woven texture, rich red and yellow ochre natural colour stripe. Hand loomed.
Perfect for cushions / blinds / window seat cushions / upholstery projects.
52cms Wide x 2.5m
(Five lengths available)

name: Lucy Gamblin Pottery Mini Beaker
description:
Beautiful handmade mini beakers by Lucy Gamblin. Teracotta body with ivory tone glaze and incised scratch decoration.

These mini beakers are handmade, therefore they may differ slightly from the picture you see.

name: Birdy House
description: A cute wooden birdy house with distressed paint finish and heart shapedhole, lift up lid and hanger on the back.

name: Porcelain pottery tree
description: Beautiful porcelain tree with traces of blue glaze through the crisp white. Perfect fordraping jewellery over on your dressing table. By Bridget Lennon.

name: Porcelain pottery tree
description: A beautiful handmade porcelain tree, perfect for draping jewellery over and keeping earrings and rings tidy on your dressing table. By Bridget Lennon.

name: Lucy Gamblin Mini Dish
description:
A small tidy dish with incised and painted decorations.

Many patterns available.

name: Dowry linen bag
description:
Vintage Dowry linen bags for storage, we use ours as a bread bag, but equally good on the desk, or in a bathroom. Simple. Rustic.

Made for Life in the UK.

name: Ceramic Espresso Beaker (Single)
description:
Beautiful espresso beaker my Bridget Lennon, porcelain base with black drippy glaze.

(spoon not included)

name: Industrial 50's shoe trolley
description:
This design is based on a 1950's trolley from a shoe factory, made in Britain. 

This rack sits everywhere, from kitchen to bedroom, and travels around on natty wheels.

(Storage basket not included)

This is a bespoke made item, please contact for delivery options.

name: Moonback Armchair
description:
A Moonback armchair, bespoke made by Hossack & Gray in UK, with a hardwood frame and traditionally upholstered seat. 

A cute heirloom armchair that will suit all of the family. Covered in a printed linen spot. 

This armchair can be covered in a range of fabrics.

This item can be collected from us or sent via courier.  Please give us a call if you wish to order on 07884 310950

name: Industrial warehouse hanging rack
description:
Supercool loft/ warehouse style hanging unit, made in Britain from waxed steel and wood on wheels.

(hanging garments not included)

This is a bespoke made item, please contact for delivery options.

name: Teak Tags (Pair)
description: Handmade teak tags for home & garden.

name: Life Scented Candle
description:
A luxury scented candle made lovingly by Life, our first scent.

Exotic top notes of fragrant gardenia lead to a heart of jasmine with a touch of orange flower & spice. 

We advise burning for 3hrs at a time, this will release enough fragrance to perfume your room. Snuff out & re-light when the melt pool has reset.

name: Unexpected Item Bag
description:
Screen printed 'Unexpected Item in Bagging Area' canvas tote bag by James Brown.

Choose from blue or a brown paper design.

name: Pair of Vintage Open Sun Armchairs
description:
Pair of Midcentury modern open armchairs upholstered in glorious 1980's fabric. Sunshine every day!

Please contact for shipping options.
